commit.message: Review comments fixed: A CountDownLatch used instead of polling loop, frame.setDefaultCloseOperation(JFrame.DISPOSE_ON_CLOSE)
Fixed review comments: Added @bug label, catch UnsupportedLookAndFeelException and ignore LnF, added robot.waitForIdle() after window creation
Fixed review comments: focusedButton.isFocusOwner() access made in EDT
Fixed review comments: waitForIdle() added after frame creation and waits until button gains focus
8281738: Create a regression test for checking the 'Space' key activation of focused Button
